body: If you want to prevent errors like this one in the future, it would be better to also check that `expr.value is None` and otherwise make it a hard error.
body_html: If you want to prevent errors like this one in the future, it would be better to also check that expr.value is None and otherwise make it a hard error.
body_text: If you want to prevent errors like this one in the future, it would be better to also check that expr.value is None and otherwise make it a hard error.
